mapper.select: select app_type_cd, app_type_nm, app_context from App_type

select e.emp_id as emp_id, e.emp_nm as emp_nm, d.dept_nm as dept_nm, p.pos_nm as pos_nm from emp e inner join dept d on e.dept_id = d.dept_id inner join pos p on e.pos_id = p.pos_id and e.emp_id = 'k15010201'
